## IAssignmentHooks interface

Implement this interface to override an assignment or receive a callback post assignment

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IAssignmentHooks 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [onPostAssignment(variation)](./js-client-sdk-common.iassignmenthooks.onpostassignment.md) | Invoked after a subject is assigned. Useful for any post assignment logic needed which is specific to an experiment/flag. Do not use this for logging assignments - use IAssignmentLogger instead. |
|  [onPreAssignment(subject)](./js-client-sdk-common.iassignmenthooks.onpreassignment.md) | Invoked before a subject is assigned to an experiment variation. |
